Feature.Name: PaymentWalletsFeature
Feature.Description: In order to manage the Payment Wallet As an api service I want to be able to deposit, withdraw and get current balance

Scenario.Name: Scenario 1 Perform payment wallet actions happy path

Name.Format: Scenario 1 Perform payment wallet actions happy path

Label.Name: SCENARIO 1 - Perform Payment Wallet Actions Happy Path

Step.Name: GIVEN A get wallet balance action is requested

StepName.Format: A get wallet balance action is requested

Step.Name: THEN The wallet balance should be set to amount "0"

StepName.Format: The wallet balance should be set to amount "{0}"

Step.Name: GIVEN A deposit amount action is requested [paymentDepositInput: "Payment.Wallet.Contracts.PaymentDepositInput"]

StepName.Format: A deposit amount action is requested [paymentDepositInput: "{0}"]

Step.Name: AND A get wallet balance action is requested

StepName.Format: A get wallet balance action is requested

Step.Name: THEN The wallet balance should be set to amount "300"

StepName.Format: The wallet balance should be set to amount "{0}"

Step.Name: GIVEN A withdraw amount action is requested [paymentWithdrawInput: "Payment.Wallet.Contracts.PaymentWithdrawInput"]

StepName.Format: A withdraw amount action is requested [paymentWithdrawInput: "{0}"]

Step.Name: AND A get wallet balance action is requested

StepName.Format: A get wallet balance action is requested

Step.Name: THEN The wallet balance should be set to amount "200"

StepName.Format: The wallet balance should be set to amount "{0}"
